Body: Possible Duplicate:  Cannot unlock tablet as have no internet connection?  Just now my android phone ( HTC Desire S ) got locked ( apparently my nephew tried the unlock pattern hell lot of time :( ). Now it is asking for userID and password. This is not the first time it happened. But earlier I used to supply my userID/pass ( same userID/pass which I use for stackexchange ) and it always worked. But this time when I tried the same id/pass combination it didn't worked. Although I can login using those credentials to my gmail account.( that means password is not changed ).After doing the quick google I got to know that I will have to do factory reset, which I really don't want to do. Please help what can I do.My phone is on Android 4.0 if that matters.
Title: How to unlock the android phone after "too many patterns attempted"?
